name: Au_Revoir_Simone
text:
Au Revoir Simone
Au Revoir Simone was an electronic band.
In 2016, Au Revoir Simone played at the Roadhouse in Twin Peaks, Washington, performing "Lark" and "A Violent Yet Flammable World."
Behind the scenes
Au Revoir Simone is an American electronic dream-pop band from Williamsburg, New York, formed in 2003, and consisting of Heather D'Angelo, Erika Forster, and Annie Hart. Their performances for Twin Peaks were used as the end credits backdrops for Part 4 and Part 9.
The group also performed "Sad Song" for Twin Peaks, but it was not used in the final cut. The performance is included in Twin Peaks: From Z to A.
